titles.title: A bill for the relief of Egya Quaison-Sackey.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Immigration, Refugees, and International Law.

bill.summary: 2/19/1987--Introduced. Declares a named individual to be eligible to apply for an immigrant visa, permanent residence, and a nonimmigrant visa despite certain eligibility restrictions in the Immigration and Nationality Act.
